name: core_legends
description: Comprehensive Core package capturing mechanics and themes from Magic's Legends (1994): bands with other, banding, rampage, poison, world enchantments, gold/legend focus, and iconic global effects.

Creature: Banding (This creature can attack or block in a band with other creatures with banding and up to one without.)

Bands with other {C} legends (Any number of legendary creatures that share a color with this creature can attack or block in a band. You choose how combat damage is assigned to creatures in the band.)
Rampage {N} (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
